ProxyProperty.name: ModelWrapper
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Sets the Model Wrapper to initialize the server mesh.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: GlobalLength
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The desired global length of the cells.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: GlobalMinimumAngle
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The desired global minimum angle of the cells.

ProxyProperty.name: MeshWrapper
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Sets the Mesh Wrapper for the algorithm to get the polydata from.

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: EntityId
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the Id of the model entity to be accessed.

IntVectorProperty.name: ItemType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the type of the model entity to be accessed.

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: Id
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the unique persistent id to specify what edge to operate on.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Length
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The desired length of the cells.

IntVectorProperty.name: BuildModelEntityMesh
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether or not to build the mesh.

IntVectorProperty.name: MeshHigherDimensionalEntities
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether or not to mesh other model entities that are affected by remeshing this edge.

IntVectorProperty.name: OperateSucceeded
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Return if the operation on the server was successful.

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: Id
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the unique persistent id to specify what face to operate on.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Length
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The desired length of the cells.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MinimumAngle
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The desired minimum angle of the cells.

IntVectorProperty.name: BuildModelEntityMesh
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether or not to build the mesh.

IntVectorProperty.name: MeshHigherDimensionalEntities
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether or not to mesh other model entities that are affected by remeshing this face.

IntVectorProperty.name: OperateSucceeded
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Return if the operation on the server was successful.
